opendial.inference

Interface InferenceAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LikelihoodWeighting, NaiveInference, SwitchingAlgorithm, VariableElimination

    public interface InferenceAlgorithm
    Generic interface for probabilistic inference algorithms. Three distinct types of queries are possible:
    • probability queries of the form P(X1,...,Xn)
    • utility queries of the form U(X1,...,Xn)
    • reduction queries where a Bayesian network is reduced to a subet of variables X1,...,Xn
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-02-04 09:51:48 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variables given the provided evidence, all specified in the query
      UtilityTable queryUtil(UtilQuery query)
      Computes the utility distribution for the action variables, given the provided evidence.
      BNetwork reduce(ReductionQuery reductionQuery)
      Estimates the probability distribution on a reduced subset of variables
